definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Boil and reduce heat, simmer for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 煮滚，小火煨煮10分钟即可。

sentences.english: Domestic staff simmered soup in it, patients scrubbed faces in it. I poured the milk in.
sentences.chinese: 锅上腻着油垢，工役们用它煨汤，病人用它洗脸。

sentences.english: Bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes or until carrots are tender.
sentences.chinese: 煮滚，小火煨煮10分钟或直到胡萝卜变软。

sentences.english: The ingredients are there; they just need to simmer and stew.
sentences.chinese: 原料齐备，只是需要细煨慢炖而已。

sentences.english: When it start to boil, turn down the heat and let the sauce simmer.
sentences.chinese: 逐渐沸腾时，关小炉火，以文火慢慢煨调味酱。

sentences.english: Anhui Cuisine Anhui Cuisine chefs focus much more attention on the temperature in cooking and are good at braising and stewing.
sentences.chinese: 安徽菜系安徽厨师注重于烹饪的温度，擅长煨炖。

sentences.english: Uncover the pan and let the soup simmer. (v. )
sentences.chinese: 揭开锅盖，让汤再煨一下。

sentences.english: Let it simmer for a while until the sauce is thicken.
sentences.chinese: 煨一下直到调料成为粘稠状。

sentences.english: Try this nutty, whole grain in place of rice with dinner or simmer barley into soups and stews.
sentences.chinese: 不妨试试这种坚韧的全麦来庖代大米做饭或者是煨汤。

sentences.english: Simmer three to four large lettuce leaves in a cup of water for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把四片大生菜叶水杯里慢慢煨上十五分钟。

sentences.english: Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer and continue cooking until the liquid is reduced by half.
sentences.chinese: 煮沸后，关小火继续煨煮直到汤减少一半。

definition: to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
to cook slowly over a low flame/pot/saucepan
to cook in a small quantity of water
quick-boil/to boil for a short time
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
to braise/to cook in soy and vinegar/braised/cooked in soy and vinegar
variant of 砂鍋|砂锅[sha1 guo1]
